name: Path T Placenta
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:**  When both the Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and extension detail are available, record the code with extension detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage.

**Note 2:** Genital metastasis (vagina, ovary, broad ligament, fallopian tube) is classified T2. Any involvement of non-genital structures, whether by direct invasion or metastasis is described using the M classification.

**Note 3:** For T, substaging is determined by the values in Site-Specific Factor 1,  Prognostic Scoring Index.
rows:
Surgical resection of primary tumor done and extension not stated or unknown
Surgical resection of primary tumor done and extension not documented in patient record

Confined to:
    Cervix
    Corpus
    Placenta

Localized, NOS

FIGO Stage I (IA, IB, I[NOS])

Stated as T1

Tumor extends to other genital structures: 
    Vagina
    Ovary
    Broad ligament 
    Fallopian tube 
by metastasis or direct extension

Adjacent connective tissue, NOS

Genital structures, NOS by direct extension or 
metastasis
   
Further contiguous extension

FIGO Stage II (IIA, IIB, II[NOS])

Stated as T2
Pathologic T is not defined for the specific site/histology

No pathologic evaluation of primary tumor
No surgical resection of primary tumor and there isn't a positive biopsy of the highest T
Only positive biopsy of tumor which is not the highest T 
Unknown if any pathologic assessment performed
